messages.subject: music the unschooling way
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/15/02 12:58:51 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/15/02 12:58:51 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Anyone in the San Fran Bay Area WANT an accordion?
>>

I would pay shipping to get it down here to FL!! Would you be willing?
I have fond memories of Swiss music at my Grandparents house and of course,
an accordian. Grandpa was really good on it. Our Swiss heritage was important
to them (Grandma is an immigrant, came over at the age of six).
We heard the accordian, yodeling and went to feasts for the Swiss community
when we visited them.
Sweet memories.

Ren
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
And remember,
"A life lived in fear is a life half lived"
